title: Thousands Of Prisoners To Be Released Early To Ease Crowding In UK Jails
content: Thousands of prisoners are to be released early starting September to prevent the "collapse" of the prison system, the UK's new justice minister announced on Friday.
summary: Thousands of prisoners are to be released early starting September to prevent the "collapse" of the prison system, the UK's new justice minister announced on Friday.

title: King Charles III's Sister Anne Resumes Public Duties After Hospitalisation
content: Princess Anne, the sister of British head of state King Charles III, returned to public duties Friday, weeks after she was treated in hospital after being struck by a horse.
summary: Princess Anne, the sister of British head of state King Charles III, returned to public duties Friday, weeks after she was treated in hospital after being struck by a horse.

title: Elon Musk's X Developing 'Dislike' Button For Downvoting Replies: Report
content: Elon Musk-run X is developing a downvoting feature which will be used to improve the ranking of replies.
summary: Elon Musk-run X is developing a downvoting feature which will be used to improve the ranking of replies.

title: Oil Tanker Seized By Iran In 2023 Bound For Oman Port: Tracking Data
content: A Chevron-chartered oil tanker seized by Iran more than a year ago is heading toward the Sohar port in Oman, LSEG ship tracking data showed on Friday.
summary: A Chevron-chartered oil tanker seized by Iran more than a year ago is heading toward the Sohar port in Oman, LSEG ship tracking data showed on Friday.

title: Pak's First Breast Milk Bank Shuts After Clerics Deem It "Un-Islamic"
content: A hospital that launched the first breast milk bank for premature babies in Pakistan is negotiating for it to be reopened after clerics deemed it un-Islamic, doctors and the national Islamic council said Friday.
summary: A hospital that launched the first breast milk bank for premature babies in Pakistan is negotiating for it to be reopened after clerics deemed it un-Islamic, doctors and the national Islamic council said Friday.

title: Man Arrested After Undercover US Cop Exposed Plot To Rape, Kill UK TV Star
content: A would-be attacker who planned to kidnap, rape, and murder one of the UK's top celebrities was on Friday given a life sentence with a minimum jail term of 15 years.
summary: A would-be attacker who planned to kidnap, rape, and murder one of the UK's top celebrities was on Friday given a life sentence with a minimum jail term of 15 years.

title: 3 Killed As Russian Regional Airliner Crashes Near Moscow: Report
content: A Russian regional airliner carrying three crew members crashed in a forested area near Moscow on Friday, killing all on board, Russian news agencies reported.
summary: A Russian regional airliner carrying three crew members crashed in a forested area near Moscow on Friday, killing all on board, Russian news agencies reported.

title: Japan Political Candidate Strips In Video, Asks Viewers If She's ''Sexy''
content: In the footage, Ms Uchino is shown seated at a table wearing a button-up shirt as she addresses Japanese voters in an anime-style voice.
summary: In the footage, Ms Uchino is shown seated at a table wearing a button-up shirt as she addresses Japanese voters in an anime-style voice.

title: "Prachanda": Firebrand Nepal Maoist Turned PM Forced Out By Ally
content: Prime Minister Pushpa Kamal Dahal lived in seclusion directing Nepal's guerrilla war but emerged from the jungle to lead the Himalayan republic when his cadres laid down their arms and joined mainstream politics.
summary: Prime Minister Pushpa Kamal Dahal lived in seclusion directing Nepal's guerrilla war but emerged from the jungle to lead the Himalayan republic when his cadres laid down their arms and joined mainstream politics.

title: Nepal PM Loses Vote Of Confidence In Parliament
content: Nepal Prime Minister Pushpa Kamal Dahal 'Prachanda' on Friday lost a vote of confidence in Parliament after the Communist Party of Nepal-Unified Marxist Leninist (CPN-UML) withdrew its support for his government.
summary: Nepal Prime Minister Pushpa Kamal Dahal 'Prachanda' on Friday lost a vote of confidence in Parliament after the Communist Party of Nepal-Unified Marxist Leninist (CPN-UML) withdrew its support for his government.

title: Israel Extends Compulsory Military Service For Men To 36 Months: Report
content: The Israeli government's security cabinet has approved a plan to extend compulsory military service for men to 36 months from the current 32 months, Israel's Ynet news outlet reported on Friday.
summary: The Israeli government's security cabinet has approved a plan to extend compulsory military service for men to 36 months from the current 32 months, Israel's Ynet news outlet reported on Friday.

title: 17-Year-Old Boy Arrested After UK Gurdwara Attack With Bladed Weapon: Cops
content: A 17-year-old boy remains in custody after two women were injured in an incident involving a "bladed weapon" at a gurdwara in Kent, south-east England, local police said on Friday.
summary: A 17-year-old boy remains in custody after two women were injured in an incident involving a "bladed weapon" at a gurdwara in Kent, south-east England, local police said on Friday.

title: Opinion: Hugs Aside, This Is How Much India And Russia Really Mean To Each Other
content: How much do Russia and India matter to each other today? This question can be answered only after stripping it of all the romanticism defining the India-Russia relationship.
summary: How much do Russia and India matter to each other today? This question can be answered only after stripping it of all the romanticism defining the India-Russia relationship.

title: First Red Mail Box With King Charles' Cypher Unveiled In Central England
content: The first red mail pillar box to bear the cypher of King Charles was unveiled on Friday, keeping up a tradition dating back almost 175 years.
summary: The first red mail pillar box to bear the cypher of King Charles was unveiled on Friday, keeping up a tradition dating back almost 175 years.

title: US Woman, 22, Found Dead Days After Judge Released Ex-Boyfriend From Jail
content: A 22-year-old university student in the United States was found beaten to death and wrapped in a sheet in the back seat of her car - days after her boyfriend was let out of jail.
summary: A 22-year-old university student in the United States was found beaten to death and wrapped in a sheet in the back seat of her car - days after her boyfriend was let out of jail.

title: A Street In UAE Named After 84-Year-Old Doctor of Indian Origin
content: A road in the UAE capital of Abu Dhabi has been named after an 84-year-old doctor with Indian roots as a tribute to his significant contributions to the country's health sector.
summary: A road in the UAE capital of Abu Dhabi has been named after an 84-year-old doctor with Indian roots as a tribute to his significant contributions to the country's health sector.

title: Surveillance System Along Borders Could Pave Way For Ceasefire In Gaza
content: Israeli and Egyptian ceasefire negotiators are in talks about an electronic surveillance system along the border between Gaza and Egypt that could allow Israel to pull back its troops from the area if a ceasefire is agreed.
summary: Israeli and Egyptian ceasefire negotiators are in talks about an electronic surveillance system along the border between Gaza and Egypt that could allow Israel to pull back its troops from the area if a ceasefire is agreed.

title: Watch: How Zelenskyy Reacted When Biden Called Him "President Putin"
content: In yet another gaffe amid concerns over his re-election bid, US President Joe Biden today mistakenly introduced his Ukraine counterpart Volodymyr Zelenskyy as his Russian rival Vladimir Putin.
summary: In yet another gaffe amid concerns over his re-election bid, US President Joe Biden today mistakenly introduced his Ukraine counterpart Volodymyr Zelenskyy as his Russian rival Vladimir Putin.

title: Woolly Mammoth DNA, Frozen 52,000 Years, Ago May Be Used To Revive Species
content: About 52,000 years ago, the skinned hide of a Siberian woolly mammoth was exposed to conditions so frigid that it spontaneously freeze-dried, locking its DNA fragments into place.
summary: About 52,000 years ago, the skinned hide of a Siberian woolly mammoth was exposed to conditions so frigid that it spontaneously freeze-dried, locking its DNA fragments into place.

title: "Would Be A Shot In The Arm For...": Ex PMs Tell G20 To Tax Super-Rich
content: Former presidents and prime ministers have sent an open letter to current leaders of the world's 20 largest economies urging support for a global tax on billionaires, which they called a rare political opportunity.
summary: Former presidents and prime ministers have sent an open letter to current leaders of the world's 20 largest economies urging support for a global tax on billionaires, which they called a rare political opportunity.
